mapper.select: select DISTINCT pa.* from `user` u inner join user_role ur on u.id=ur.user_id inner join role r on ur.role_id=r.id inner join permission p on p.role_id =r.id inner join page pa on pa.id = p.related_id where u.`status`=1 and pa.`status`=1 and p.related_type=1 and u.id = #{userId}
SELECT pa.* FROM role r INNER JOIN permission p ON r.id=p.role_id INNER JOIN page pa ON p.related_id=pa.id WHERE p.related_type=1 AND r.id=#{roleId} ORDER BY pa.`level`,pa.Weight ASC
